verses.name: 2 Chronicles 17:14
verses.text: And these are the numbers of them according to the house of their fathers: Of Judah, the captains of thousands; Adnah the chief, and with him mighty men of valour three hundred thousand.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 17:15
verses.text: And next to him was Jehohanan the captain, and with him two hundred and fourscore thousand.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 17:16
verses.text: And next him was Amasiah the son of Zichri, who willingly offered himself unto the Lord; and with him two hundred thousand mighty men of valour.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 17:17
verses.text: And of Benjamin; Eliada a mighty man of valour, and with him armed men with bow and shield two hundred thousand.
